events.message: Customer reported a car accident involving their vehicle hitting a guardrail on the highway during nighttime.
The incident was reviewed and categorised specifically as an Auto Accident claim for further processing.
An experienced claims agent was assigned to the case to assist the customer promptly and ensure smooth handling.
The customer was sent an official acknowledgment confirming receipt of the auto accident claim and next steps.
Request sent to customer asking for police report, photos of vehicle damage, and a copy of their driving license.
Customer provided all requested documents including the police report, detailed photos, and insurance information.
Investigation team began reviewing evidence, speaking with witnesses, and assessing liability for the collision.
Investigation concluded with findings supporting that the customer was not at fault for the accident.
A fair settlement amount covering repairs and rental car expenses was proposed and sent to the customer.
Customer expressed satisfaction with the prompt investigation process and the proposed settlement terms.
Management approved the settlement proposal after final review and validation of all claim details.
Settlement payment was issued electronically to the customerâ€™s bank account as per agreed terms.
The claim was officially closed after confirming the customer received the payment and no further issues remain.
All claim files and correspondence were securely archived for future reference and compliance purposes.
